page.title: 11HOME LIFE
page.content:
Adrian is 9 and he lives with his sister and his parents at Whiteheathfield farm.
8.00am Got up 8.10am Moved the wire and stakes for the cows to have a new piece of grass. 9.00am Had breakfast 1 weetabix a boiled egg and a cup of tea. 10.00am Fed the chickens,they have half a bucket of corn,they didn't need any water and there are 23 hens. 10.15am Took a bucket and went looking for eggs and found about 17. 10.30am Put up seat on my sisters bike. 11.00am Rode our bikes to Susan Goffs to give her an eighteenth birthday card. 11.10am Mr Goff gave us a drink and a biscuit and then we rode home.
